summary: Adds the ability to craft a staff enchanter for Lakeview Manor
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b][u]Lakeview Manor Staff Enchanter[/u][/b][/size][/center]
It always bothered me that you could build these great houses but still had to travel to Solsthiem in order to get access to staff enchanting. Now you need only make one trip to solsthiem, grab a heart stone and then whip back to lakeview manor and build your own staff enchanter.

This mod adds the ability to craft a staff enchanter to Lakeview Manor.  It can be located on the second floor of the main hall.
In order to have access to the staff enchanter you MUST first craft it at the workstation in the main hall under the Furniture category.
[center]
The requirements to craft the staff enchanter are:

-1 Heartstone-
-1 Grandsoul Gem Filled-
-2 Ebony ignots-
-1 sawed log-[/center]

                                                          
change log:

v 1.0.0 - initial release
v 1.0.1 - added missing scripts to download
[center][/center]
I recommend that you haven't built lakeview manor main hall before installing this mod as it might cause serious clipping with some other furniture.

Please note: this mod requires the Hearthfire and Dragonborn DLC

Please see the readme for conflicts/bugs.
author: midgetalien
